externalDocs.description: Spring Boot Actuator Web API Documentation

post.description: A single of data requests for specific frameworks and companies is being sent.

200.description: Successfully processed a single data request.

post.description: A bulk of data requests for specific frameworks and companies is being sent.

200.description: Successfully processed a bulk of data requests.

post.summary: Assign company role for the company to the user.
post.description: The company role for the specified company is being assigned to the user. Endpoint accessible to all Dataland-Admins and some Company-Role-Assignees of the company, based on the company role that shall be assigned.

delete.summary: Remove company role for the company from the user.
delete.description: The company role for the specified company is being removed from the user. Endpoint accessible to all Dataland-Admins and some Company-Role-Assignees of the company, based on the company role that shall be removed.

head.summary: Validate company role for company and user.
head.description: Checks whether the company role for the company is assigned to the user. Endpoint accessible to all Dataland-Admins, for all users that check for their own userId, and all Company-Role-Assignees of the company.

404.description: Either the specified company does not exist on Dataland or the user does not have the company role for it.

200.description: The specified user has the company role.

post.summary: Request company ownership for the company.
post.description: Request company ownership for the company on Dataland. Endpoint accessible to all Dataland users.

head.summary: Validate existence of company ownership for the company.
head.description: Validates if at least one company owner exists for the specified company. Endpoint accessible to all Dataland users.

404.description: The specified company has no company owner(s) yet

200.description: The specified company has company owner(s).

patch.description: Updates status and message history of data request given data request id.

head.summary: This head request checks whether the logged-in user has access to dataset.
head.description: This head request checks whether the logged-in user has access to dataset.

200.description: The user can access the dataset.

404.description: Either the specified dataset does not exist or the user cannot access the dataset.

get.summary: Get all stored data requests based on filters.
get.description: Gets all the stored data request based on filters.

get.summary: Gets a stored data request for a given ID.
get.description: Gets the stored data request corresponding to the provided data request ID.

200.description: Successfully retrieved data request for the provided ID.

get.summary: Get all stored data requests of the user making the request.
get.description: Gets all the stored data request created by the user who is making the request.

200.description: Successfully retrieved data requests for the user.

get.summary: Get the number of requests based on filters.
get.description: Get the number of requests based on filters.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the number of data requests.

get.description: Gets all data requests that match the given filters, while aggregating userIDs.

get.summary: Get company role assignments that match the provided filters.
get.description: Get company role assignments that match the provided filters. Endpoint fully accessible to all Dataland-Admins. Company-Role-Assignees can access the endpoint if companyId-filter is set to their company. Any Dataland-user can access the endpoint if the userId-filter is set to their userId.

404.description: The specified company does not exist on Dataland.
